recipe.title: Avocado Chicken Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; red onion, diced ; (35 g)

steps.step: Combine avocado, yogurt, lime, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt in a medium bowl. Mash the avocado to desired consistency.
Add onion, celery, jalapeño, and chicken into the avocado mixture and stir to coat evenly.
Serve on toast with optional topping of sriracha and cilantro.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Combine avocado, yogurt, lime, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt in a medium bowl.
Mash the avocado to desired consistency.
Add onion, celery, jalapeño, and chicken into the avocado mixture and stir to coat evenly.
Serve on toast with optional topping of sriracha and cilantro.
